DLF AIG MWG Metadata Assessment Toolkit

This is the website for the Digital Library Federation (DLF) Assessment Interest Group (AIG) Metadata Working Group, also known as the DLF Metadata Assessment Working Group.

This site contains information about several projects that this group has undertaken, including:

  • An environmental scan of metadata assessment and metadata quality literature, tools, presentations, and organizations (originally undertaken in 2016, currently under review).
  • A framework for assessing descriptive metadata in digital collections (undertaken in 2017).
  • A repository for metadata assessment tools (Ongoing/Current).
  • A collection of metadata application profiles, mappings, and practices (Ongoing/Current).
  • A survey of metadata assessment and metadata quality practices among various libraries, archives, and museums (Ongoing/Current).
